author: Bruce Schreiner / AP
title: Sen. Rand Paul Says He Is Now Coronavirus-Free and Volunteering at a Kentucky Hospital
description: US Sen. Rand Paul said Tuesday that he has recovered from the coronavirus and started volunteering at a hospital in his Kentucky hometown.
content:
(FRANKFORT, Ky.) — U.S. Sen. Rand Paul said Tuesday that he has recovered from the coronavirus and has started volunteering at a hospital in his Kentucky hometown.
The Republican lawmaker tested positive for the virus in March, becoming the first case of COV… [+1949 chars]
